ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars Mandalorian Custom Armor Set
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Highly customizable Mandalorian Armor
[h1]~Mod Order~[/h1] The Forge - Anvil This mod
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Added 21 Helmets -Added 19 ChestPlate -Added 20 Pauldron -Added 3 LegPlate -Added 15 Bandolier/Belt bag
[h1]Plans:[/h1] -More cosmetics -Redo Texture -Make free armor template
[h1]recommend Mod"[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247] Graphics Settings - Fix your textures! [/url]
